metadata.author: Deloitte
metadata.description: This rule detect every time project created in GCP
metadata.name: GCP_Project_Create

ruleText:
rule GCP_Project_Create 
{
  meta:
    name = "GCP_Project_Create"
    author = "Deloitte"
    description = "This rule detect every time project created in GCP"
    severity = "Low"
    mitre_technique = "{NA: Not Applicable}"
    mitre_tactic = "{NA: Not Applicable}"

  events:
  $e.metadata.log_type = "GCP_CLOUDAUDIT"
  $e.metadata.product_event_type = "CreateProject"
  $e.metadata.product_name = "Google Cloud Platform"
  $e.metadata.vendor_name = "Google Cloud Platform"



  condition:
    $e
}
